name: scheduled_check

on:
  schedule:
    - cron: "30 * * * *"

jobs:
  health_check:
    runs-on: ubuntu-20.04
    steps:
      - name: Check the deployed service URL
        id: health_check
        uses: jtalk/url-health-check-action@v3
        with:
          url: https://pokeman-service.onrender.com/
          follow-redirect: false
          max-attempts: 1

      - name: Notify on Discord - Success
        if: steps.health_check.outcome == 'success'
        uses: rjstone/discord-webhook-notify@v1
        with:
          severity: info
          details: "Health check succeeded for https://pokeman-service.onrender.com/"
          webhookUrl: ${{ secrets.DISCORD_WEBHOOK_URL }}

      - name: Notify on Discord - Failure
        if: steps.health_check.outcome == 'failure'
        uses: rjstone/discord-webhook-notify@v1
        with:
          severity: error
          details: "Health check failed for https://pokeman-service.onrender.com/"
          webhookUrl: ${{ secrets.DISCORD_WEBHOOK_URL }}
